column5: Hi, I will going to the camp near Gannons Narrow area and would like to get some shore fishing with my kids so if anyone can recommend some general area that will be appreciated. I heard that there is some deep area near Gannons Narrows Marina for good walleye and crappie fishing! please email me at   [emailÂ protected]  Thanks in advance
Under the bridge & from the causeway at the narrows itself is probably your best bet for accessible shore fishing.
